comment.narrative: The incidence rate of 17 per100000 population - 2013 The treatment success rate of 84% - 2011 The notification rate of 12 per 100000 population - 2013 7 TB-MDR detected cases quarterly - 2013 The mortality rate 2.1 per 100000 - 2013
